data.meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.
data.sentence: The word الْعَالَمِينَ comes from the root ع ل م and is associated with the meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.

data.meanings: excel, distinguish, surpass, superior, gain/gift, bestow benefit/bounty/favour/grace
data.sentence: The word فَضَّلْنَا comes from the root ف ض ل and is associated with the meanings: excel, distinguish, surpass, superior, gain/gift, bestow benefit/bounty/favour/grace

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word وَكُلًّا comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
The word وَلُوطًا comes from the root ل و ط and is associated with the meanings: Also see Lam-Tay Lut
